translations: vt.使整洁；使漂亮潇洒；使更敏捷；使更聪明
vi.打扮；变得更轻快；变得更聪明；变得更剧烈

sentences.sentence: It wouldn't do you any harm to smarten yourself up.
I tried to let him smarten up.
sentences.translation: 我曾试图令他变得更精明。

sentences.sentence: I have to smarten myself up about talking to my superior.
sentences.translation: 我得把我对上司的谈话谈得再高明些。
